title: Microgravity Effects on Cell Growth
description: Study of how microgravity environments affect cellular division and growth patterns in space.

title: Plant Growth in Space Habitats
description: Research on cultivating vegetables and plants in closed-loop space environments for long-duration missions.

title: Bone Density Loss in Astronauts
description: Investigation into mechanisms of bone density reduction during extended spaceflight and countermeasures.

title: Radiation Effects on DNA
description: Analysis of cosmic radiation impact on genetic material and cellular repair mechanisms.

title: Bacterial Behavior in Microgravity
description: Study of bacterial colonization patterns and antibiotic resistance in space environments.

title: Cardiovascular Changes in Space
description: Research on heart function adaptations and blood flow dynamics during spaceflight.

title: Immune System Adaptation
description: Investigation of immune response changes in astronauts during long-duration space missions.

title: Protein Crystallization in Space
description: Study of enhanced protein crystal formation in microgravity for drug development.

title: Fruit Fly Genetics Experiments
description: Multi-generational studies of Drosophila in space to understand hereditary effects of spaceflight.

title: Algae for Life Support Systems
description: Research on using photosynthetic organisms for oxygen production and CO2 recycling in spacecraft.

title: Muscle Atrophy Countermeasures
description: Development of exercise protocols and pharmaceuticals to prevent muscle loss in space.

title: Tardigrade Survival in Space
description: Study of extremophile organisms and their ability to survive in the vacuum of space.
